functions.name: Sin
functions.description: Computes the sine of a number.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number to compute the sine for.

errors.message: The parameter must be a number.

functions.name: SinTable
functions.description: Computes the sine of each number in a table.

parameters.name: E
parameters.description: The table of numbers to compute the sine for.

errors.message: The parameter must be a table.
